title: SOLD; T206 Ty Cobb red portrait Psa 2
author: 3-2-count

posts.post_title: SOLD; T206 Ty Cobb red portrait Psa 2
posts.post_content:
For sale - T206 Ty Cobb red portrait Psa 2. Extremely nice for the grade. 

Strong examples no matter the grade continue to rise. $5300 delivered

Please, email only if interested -    [url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Commitment to purchase supercedes any ongoing negotiation. 

Thank you, Tony

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/psa2redcobbfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/psa2redcobbback.jpg[/IMG]
Man the front centering on that card is AWESOME!

Many thanks Rocky & Neal.

Ty has sold and is no longer available.

Gracias everyone,
